description: Avoid absolute positioning that locks content in place and prevents reflow at narrow widths.
recommendation: Use flow layout containers, flex/grid, or relative positioning so content can wrap and reflow at 320px width or 400% zoom. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.10)
algorithm: Scans inline styles for position:absolute/fixed and XAML Canvas/AbsoluteLayout positioning attributes.
algorithm_advanced: Flags inline style position values of absolute/fixed and XAML Canvas.* or AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds attributes.
